name: Mine Cobblestone
notes: Use (params.count) to determine what 'X' item count should be. A pickaxe of any kind is required to mine cobblestone.

steps.title: Mine Cobblestone
steps.details: Mine 'X' stone blocks using a pickaxe (cobblestone drops from 'stone' or 'cobblestone' blocks. (Recommended for pipeline: 11 cobblestone).

steps.title: Verify Cobblestone
steps.details: Check inventory to confirm you have at least '11 cobblestone'.
